events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn’t fit properly and I'd like to request a refund.
The issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. The jacket is indeed unused, and I still have the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned jacket. We will email you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I will send back the jacket as soon as I receive the label.
The refund process has been initiated. Please ship the jacket with the provided label to complete the refund.
Just checking in to confirm whether you were able to send the jacket back and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday with the prepaid label. Please let me know once the refund is finalized.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We’ve sent you a short survey to get your feedback on our refund process. We appreciate your time in helping us improve.
I completed the survey. Overall, I’m satisfied with how smoothly the refund was handled by your team.
The refund case has been officially closed following customer confirmation and positive survey feedback.
